snippet: Andrew McCutchen went 4 for 5 and finished a home run short of a cycle, and Jordy Mercer drove in a career-high four runs to lead the Pittsburgh Pirates to an 8-2 rout of the Philadelphia Phillies on Friday....

headline.print_headline: McCutchen Has 4 Hits in Pirates' Rout of Phillies
headline.main: McCutchen Has 4 Hits in Pirates' Rout of Phillies

lead_paragraph: Andrew McCutchen went 4 for 5 and finished a home run short of a cycle, and Jordy Mercer drove in a career-high four runs to lead the Pittsburgh Pirates to an 8-2 rout of the Philadelphia Phillies on Friday.
